summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CareerLift AI Career Transition Platform. Tested backend APIs, frontend UI flows, user authentication, resume parsing, and dashboard functionality. Most core features working correctly with some Claude API timeout issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Claude API calls timing out after 30-90 seconds
critical_bugs.details: Updated Claude model from deprecated 'claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022' to current 'claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929' but still experiencing timeouts

minor_issues.issue: Fixed - was expecting query parameter instead of request body
minor_issues.details: Updated endpoint to accept product_type as query parameter

design_issues.issue: Design looks professional and modern with good contrast

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, features, pricing sections
User registration flow (/register) - creates account and redirects
User login flow (/login) - authenticates and redirects to dashboard
Dashboard loads with usage stats and personalized greeting
Resume upload/parse endpoint (POST /api/resume/parse) with text parsing
AI roles endpoint (GET /api/roles) returns 20 roles correctly
Usage tracking endpoint (GET /api/usage) shows correct limits
Mock checkout endpoint (POST /api/payments/checkout) works after fix
Resume parsing auto-populates background form fields
Multi-step analyzer interface with progress indicators

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All UI flows working, minor UX improvements possible)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Claude API timeout issue in career analysis endpoint. The API calls are taking longer than 30-90 seconds causing timeouts. Consider: 1) Optimizing the Claude prompt to reduce response time, 2) Implementing async processing with status polling, 3) Adding retry logic, or 4) Increasing timeout limits. All other functionality is working correctly.
